div.h1: The Heron’s Nest: Food Options During Closure

div.class: image-block-outer-wrapper layout-caption-below design-layout-inline combination-animation-none individual-animation-none individual-text-animation-none

div.p: Do you miss Chicken Thursdays? Do you need a quick and easy way to get breakfast, lunch and dinner on the table? Utilize our convenient to-go service as you pick up homework packets and other school materials! Meals offered may vary week to week, depending on food stock!

li.p: Orders are due every Friday at 4pm and can be picked up the following Friday from 11am-3pm. Thank you for supporting Great River School during this unprecedented school closure!

If you’ve been enjoying cooking at home but want to still support our community you can anonymously purchase a meal for a family that needs a bit of help! Check the online store below to donate a meal.
If you are a family that would love to accept a family dinner package at no-cost head to this link. Meals will be supplied on a first-come-first-serve basis.
Free & reduced lunch families can always receive breakfast and lunch packages for free by ordering through this survey.

div.class: image-block-outer-wrapper layout-caption-below design-layout-inline combination-animation-none individual-animation-none individual-text-animation-none
image-block-outer-wrapper layout-caption-below design-layout-inline combination-animation-none individual-animation-none individual-text-animation-none
image-block-outer-wrapper layout-caption-below design-layout-inline combination-animation-none individual-animation-none individual-text-animation-none

a.em: Click here for a downloadable PDF version of our menu

br.br: Heron-to-Go is open for anyone to order! You don't have to be a Great River School family or student, so tell your neighbors if you think they would like to be nourished by our delicious food!

li.p: We are staggering prep shifts to minimize staff contact and maintain appropriate safe distance.
Only one nutrition team member is to be working in each prep area at a time.
We have bolstered our cleaning and sanitizing practices in the kitchen.
We will be using fresh gloves and washing our hands before and after every pickup.
Our employees are all committed to social distancing when outside of work.

div.span: Great River School, 1326 Energy Park Dr, St Paul, MN, 55108, United States
